# PED::SET_PED_HELMET_TEXTURE_INDEX

## Summary
Sets the helmet texture index to be used instead of default, -1 uses default. This can't be set if the ped has a helmet on already

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** overwriteHelmetTex = -1
